keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

headline.print_headline: New Jersey Transportation Chief to Leave Amid a Federal Investigation
headline.main: New Jersey Transportation Chief to Leave Amid Federal Inquiry

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and KATE ZERNIKE

snippet: Jamie Fox, who has been linked to an investigation into dealings between United Airlines and the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, will leave by month’s end, Gov. Chris Christie announced.
abstract: New Jersey Transportation Commissioner Jamie Fox says he will step down from his longtime position in October; Fox is being investigated in connection with federal inquiry into dealings between Port Authority of New York and New Jersey and United Airlines.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Fox, who has been linked to an investigation into dealings between United Airlines and the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, will leave by month’s end, Gov. Chris Christie announced.
